p: The highest reducing sugar content (mainly due to glucose and fructose) was detected in watercress and rocket salad (8.44 and 7.98 mg GLU/g FW, respectively), while daikon and broccoli contained an almost halved content (4.47 and 4.66 mg GLU/g FW respectively) of these compounds. Considering the total sugar content, mustard showed the highest content by a significant amount (58.11 mg GLU/g FW), threefold higher than that of broccoli, rocket salad, and watercress, and twofold higher than that of daikon.
